ConnectorProvisioningConfig.description: Contains information about the configuration of the connector being registered.

properties.name: Lambda
properties.description: Contains information about the configuration of the lambda which is being registered as the connector.

type.description: Contains information about the configuration of the lambda which is being registered as the connector.

LambdaConnectorProvisioningConfig.description: Contains information about the configuration of the lambda which is being registered as the connector.

properties.name: LambdaArn
properties.description: Lambda ARN of the connector being registered.

type.description: Lambda ARN of the connector being registered.

properties.name: ConnectorLabel
properties.description: The name of the connector. The name is unique for each ConnectorRegistration in your AWS account.

type.description: The name of the connector. The name is unique for each ConnectorRegistration in your AWS account.

properties.name: ConnectorProvisioningConfig
properties.description: Contains information about the configuration of the connector being registered.

type.description: Contains information about the configuration of the connector being registered.

properties.name: ConnectorProvisioningType
properties.description: The provisioning type of the connector. Currently the only supported value is LAMBDA.

type.description: The provisioning type of the connector. Currently the only supported value is LAMBDA.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A description about the connector that's being registered.

type.description: A description about the connector that's being registered.

properties.name: ConnectorArn
properties.description: The arn of the connector. The arn is unique for each ConnectorRegistration in your AWS account.

type.description: The arn of the connector. The arn is unique for each ConnectorRegistration in your AWS account.
